description:
Explore new frontiers, or just new runs at the resort. With their ventilated cylindrical lens, the Frontier goggles keep your vision clear, so you can scope the best lines.

  • Cylindrical carbonic-X lens provides crisp detail edge-to-edge
  • Fog-X anti-fog lens helps keep your vision clear
  • Utilizes Smith’s Responsive Fit™ design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight
  • Soft compression molded foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Compatible with Smith helmets for optimized comfort and ventilation
  • Strap has silicone strips to keep it in place
  • Includes a goggle
  • Designed for medium faces
name: Smith Frontier Goggles - Unisex
